title: I'm level 21 but still can't use most boards.
body: Why can't I post to most of the boards? I'm level 21 now. Starting to get annoying. Please fix or explain.

replies.body: Targons Blade it's working now. Must have synced cause now it's working.

Generally, when this issue happens, it's because your Boards profile and Summoner profile haven't synced. Creating a post like this will typically force a resync and resolve the issue. Try using the boards features you were trying to use before, and if you still have issues, try [clearing your browser's data](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) as others have suggested here.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Can you add Microsoft Edge to that article?
I have the same issue, and I have tried relogging as well as clearing cache/cookies etc.
Have either of you tried relogging into the boards?
same I'm lv 30 and i can't post
